Posts.Content: Nov 16, 2014 05:49AM justgrateful wrote: Same with me i am waiting for the oncotype test result to see if i will need chemo or not. i'm hoping i wont as it terrifies me. Before mastectomy, i was told i had multi focal DCIS grade 3. But the pathology report showed on top of the DCIS, 4 sites of IDC ( 1mm each) that MRI, MAmmogram and ultrasound did not pick up and 1 lymph node out of 5 positive with 0.25 mm of cancer cells. Hoping to get a low score. but still wondering what would be best regardless of the result.
Posts.Title: Waiting for oncotype test to come back. Worried! Krynko Bcky
